title: ‘The Confidence Is There’: Decathlon-Ag2r Backs Its Chances for First Sprint Escapades in Decades
content:
Decathlon-Ag2r La Mondiale undergoes reinvention in quest to return Sam Bennett to Tour de France glory in 2024.

Read the full article at ‘The Confidence Is There’: Decathlon-Ag2r Backs Its Chances for First Sprint Escapades in Decades on Velo.
author: sstokes
